Name: Approximate
Description: Magically estimate the number of nearby objects.

Name: Bullhorn
Description: Magnify your voice to be heard at a distance.

Name: Chill Touch
Description: Your touch hurts the living or disorients undead.

Name: Dancing Lights
Description: Create four floating lights you can move.

Name: Daze
Description: Damage a creature's mind and possibly stun it.

Name: Detect Magic
Description: Sense whether magic is nearby.

Name: Forbidding Ward
Description: Protect an ally against one specific enemy.

Name: Ghost Sound
Description: Make false sounds.

Name: Guidance
Description: Divine guidance improves one roll.

Name: Haunting Hymn
Description: A powerful hymn harms and deafens.

Name: Infectious Enthusiasm
Description: Encourage yourself and an ally to improve one roll apiece.

Name: Invoke True Name
Description: You speak the true name of a creature to more surely affect it with your magic.

Name: Join Pasts
Description: Share thoughts and experiences with allies.

Name: Know Direction
Description: Find true north.

Name: Light
Description: Make an object glow.

Name: Mage Hand
Description: Command a floating hand to move an object.

Name: Message
Description: Speak a message to a distant creature, who can reply.

Name: Prestidigitation
Description: Perform a minor magical trick.

Name: Protect Companion
Description: Shield your eidolon or minion from harm.

Name: Read Aura
Description: Detect if an object is magical, and determine the school of its magic.

Name: Read the Air
Description: Pick up societal cues.

Name: Shield
Description: A shield of magical force blocks attacks and magic missiles.

Name: Sigil
Description: Leave a magical mark.

Name: Summon Instrument
Description: Conjure a musical instrument.

Name: Tame
Description: Make a domesticated animal friendlier to you.

Name: Telekinetic Projectile
Description: Fling an object at a creature.

Name: Wash Your Luck
Description: Ignore misfortune once.

Name: Agitate
Description: You send the target’s mind and body into overdrive, forcing it to become restless and hyperactive.

Name: Alarm
Description: Be alerted if a creature enters a warded area.

Name: Animate Dead
Description: Animate an undead creature to fight on your behalf.

Name: Animate Rope
Description: Command a rope to move and tie as you wish.

Name: Anticipate Peril
Description: You grant the target brief foresight.

Name: Bane
Description: Weaken enemies' attacks in an aura around you.

Name: Biting Words
Description: Hurl sonic taunts to hurt creatures.

Name: Bless
Description: Strengthen allies' attacks in an aura around you.

Name: Breadcrumbs
Description: Make a trail behind a creature.

Name: Charm
Description: A creature becomes more friendly to you.

Name: Color Spray
Description: Swirling colors dazzle or stun creatures.

Name: Command
Description: Bid a creature to approach, run, release something, lie prone, or stand up.

Name: Concordant Choir
Description: Damage foes with music.

Name: Déjà Vu
Description: Make a creature do the same thing again.

Name: Detect Alignment
Description: See auras of a chosen alignment.

Name: Draw Ire
Description: Mentally sting a creature's mind to make it less capable of attacking creatures other than you.

Name: Echoing Weapon
Description: Your attacks build up to release a sonic pulse.

Name: Endure
Description: You invigorate the touched creature’s mind and urge it to press on.

Name: Exchange Image
Description: Trade appearances with the target.

Name: Fear
Description: Frighten a creature, possibly making it flee.

Name: Floating Disk
Description: A disk of energy follows you, carrying objects.

Name: Friendfetch
Description: You shoot out ephemeral, telekinetic strands that drag each target directly toward you, stopping in the closest unoccupied space to you in this path.

Name: Gravitational Pull
Description: Pull one or more creatures towards you using gravity.

Name: Grim Tendrils
Description: Creatures in a line take negative damage and bleed.

Name: Ill Omen
Description: Curse a creature with misfortune.

Name: Illusory Disguise
Description: Make yourself look like a different creature.

Name: Illusory Object
Description: Form a convincing illusion of an object.

Name: Imprint Message
Description: Put a false psychic imprint on an object.

Name: Invisible Item
Description: Make an item disappear from view.

Name: Item Facade
Description: Disguise an item to look perfect or shoddy.

Name: Liberating Command
Description: You call out a liberating cry, urging an ally to break free of an effect that holds them in place.

Name: Lock
Description: Make a lock hard to open.

Name: Lose the Path
Description: React to impede and possibly divert a Stride.

Name: Mage Armor
Description: Ward yourself with magical armor.

Name: Magic Aura
Description: Change how an item's magic appears to detecting spells.

Name: Magic Missile
Description: Pelt creatures with unerring bolts of magical force.

Name: Magic Weapon
Description: Make a weapon temporarily magical.

Name: Mending
Description: Repair one non-magical item.

Name: Message Rune
Description: You record a message up to 5 minutes long and inscribe a special rune on any flat unattended surface within reach.

Name: Mindlink
Description: Mentally impart 10 minutes' worth of information in an instant.

Name: Nudge the Odds
Description: Cheat at gambling.

Name: Object Reading
Description: Get psychic impressions from an object.

Name: Penumbral Shroud
Description: You envelop the target in a shroud of shadow.

Name: Pet Cache
Description: Hide a familiar or animal companion in a pocket dimension.

Name: Phantom Pain
Description: Cause a creature ongoing pain that sickens it.

Name: Pocket Library
Description: Withdraw books from a pocket library for study.

Name: Protection
Description: Shield a creature against those of a chosen alignment.

Name: Quick Sort
Description: Automatically sort many objects.

Name: Ray of Enfeeblement
Description: Sap a creature's strength.

Name: Restyle
Description: Make permanent style changes to clothing.

Name: Sanctuary
Description: Protect a creature from being attacked.

Name: Schadenfreude
Description: React to your critical failure to distract foes with their exultation.

Name: Seashell of Stolen Sound
Description: Copy a sound in a magical seashell.

Name: Share Lore
Description: You share your knowledge with the touched creatures.

Name: Sleep
Description: Cause creatures in a small area to fall asleep.

Name: Soothe
Description: Heal the target and bolster them against mental attacks.

Name: Spirit Link
Description: Continually transfer your health to someone else.

Name: Summon Fey
Description: Conjure a fey to fight on your behalf.

Name: Synchronize
Description: Place sigils on your targets that flash at a prespecified time.

Name: Thicket of Knives
Description: Illusory copies of your weapon arm improve your ability to feint.

Name: Thoughtful Gift
Description: Teleport an item to an ally's grasp.

Name: True Strike
Description: Make your next attack especially accurate.

Name: Unseen Servant
Description: Create an invisible creature to help you.

Name: Ventriloquism
Description: Throw your voice.

Name: Animated Assault
Description: Temporarily animate small objects to attack creatures in an area.

Name: Animus Mine
Description: You implant a mental mine within your psyche that detonates against anyone attempting to manipulate your thoughts.

Name: Augury
Description: Predict whether a course of action brings good fortune.

Name: Befitting Attire
Description: Make clothes fit the occasion.

Name: Blistering Invective
Description: Light a creature on fire with the sheer viciousness of your words.

Name: Blood Vendetta
Description: Cause a creature that attacks you to start bleeding.

Name: Blur
Description: Cause a target's form to become blurry and hard to hit.

Name: Calm Emotions
Description: Suppress strong emotions and hostility.

Name: Charitable Urge
Description: Make a creature give away an object in its possession.

Name: Comprehend Language
Description: A creature understands one language.

Name: Continual Flame
Description: A magical flame burns indefinitely.

Name: Darkness
Description: Suppress all light in an area.

Name: Darkvision
Description: See in the dark.

Name: Deafness
Description: Make a creature deaf.

Name: Death Knell
Description: Finish off a creature who's near death.

Name: Dispel Magic
Description: End a spell or suppress an item's magic.

Name: Faerie Fire
Description: Colorful light prevents creatures from being concealed or invisible.

Name: False Life
Description: Gain temporary HP.

Name: Fear the Sun
Description: You cause the creature's vision to become particularly sensitive.

Name: Feast of Ashes
Description: You curse the target with a hunger no food can sate.

Name: Final Sacrifice
Description: Channel energy to blow up your minion.

Name: Gentle Repose
Description: A corpse doesn't decay and can't become undead.

Name: Ghoulish Cravings
Description: Infect a creature with ghoul fever.

Name: Grave Impressions
Description: You project a fragment of your senses into the corpse.

Name: Hideous Laughter
Description: Fits of laughter make a creature unable to take all its actions.

Name: Humanoid Form
Description: Take the shape of a humanoid.

Name: Illusory Creature
Description: Form a convincing illusion of a creature.

Name: Imp Sting
Description: You reproduce an imp's evil, poisonous sting, stabbing at an enemy and possibly affecting them with the devil's benumbing venom.

Name: Inner Radiance Torrent
Description: Gather spiritual energy to fire a storm of force bolts and beams.

Name: Instant Armor
Description: Set a contingency to return your armor to you.

Name: Invisibility
Description: A creature can’t be seen until it attacks.

Name: Knock
Description: Make a door, lock, or container easier to open, and possibly open it immediately.

Name: Lucky Number
Description: Set a contingency to reroll a specific, randomly chosen d20 result.

Name: Magic Mouth
Description: Make an illusory mouth appear to speak a message.

Name: Mimic Undead
Description: Pretend to be undead.

Name: Mind Games
Description: You lock minds with the target, trying to mentally subdue them.

Name: Mirror Image
Description: Illusory duplicates of you cause attacks to miss.

Name: Misdirection
Description: Cause one creature’s auras to appear to be another’s.

Name: Paranoia
Description: Make a creature believe everyone is a threat.

Name: Penumbral Disguise
Description: You wrap the target in shadows, granting them a +1 status bonus to Stealth checks to Hide while in dim light or darkness.

Name: Persistent Servant
Description: Summon a long-term unseen servant for a single task.

Name: Phantasmal Treasure
Description: Tempt a creature with an illusory reward.

Name: Phantom Crowd
Description: Create an illusory crowd that loudly agrees with you.

Name: Phantom Steed
Description: Conjure a magical horse.

Name: Radiant Field
Description: You create an area of bright light.

Name: Reaper's Lantern
Description: A ghostly lantern diminishes healing for the living and weakens undead.

Name: Remove Fear
Description: Free a creature from its fright.

Name: Remove Paralysis
Description: Free a creature from paralysis.

Name: Resist Energy
Description: Protect a creature from one type of energy damage.

Name: Restoration
Description: Reduce a condition or lessen a toxin.

Name: Restore Senses
Description: Remove a blinding or deafening effect.

Name: See Invisibility
Description: See invisible creatures and objects.

Name: Shatter
Description: Shatter an object with a high-frequency sonic attack.

Name: Silence
Description: Mute all sound from a creature.

Name: Sonata Span
Description: Manifest a path with a tune.

Name: Sound Burst
Description: Damage and deafen creatures with a powerful din.

Name: Spectral Hand
Description: Create a semicorporeal hand that touches creatures to target them with your spells.

Name: Spirit Sense
Description: Find spirits and haunts.

Name: Spiritual Weapon
Description: Materialize a deific weapon of force that appears and attacks repeatedly.

Name: Status
Description: Keep track of a willing creature's location and well-being.

Name: Summoner's Precaution
Description: Set a contingency to avoid being knocked out alongside your eidolon.

Name: Summoner's Visage
Description: Change your eidolon to cosmetically appear to be your identical twin.

Name: Telekinetic Maneuver
Description: Disarm, Shove, or Trip a creature telekinetically.

Name: Thundering Dominance
Description: Make your companion or eidolon intimidating and let it emit a sonic roar.

Name: Timely Tutor
Description: Connect your eidolon or familiar to the Akashic Record to briefly grant it knowledge.

Name: Touch of Idiocy
Description: Dull a target's mind with a touch.

Name: Umbral Extraction
Description: Attempt to steal a spell slot.

Name: Undetectable Alignment
Description: Make a creature or object appear neutral to alignment detection.

Name: Vomit Swarm
Description: Vermin erupt in a cone from your mouth, biting and stinging creatures.

Name: Warrior's Regret
Description: Regrets overcome a foe when they harm others.

Name: Worm's Repast
Description: Gnawing worms materialize within the flesh of the target creature.

Name: Agonizing Despair
Description: Mentally damage and frighten a creature.

Name: Bind Undead
Description: Take control of a mindless undead.

Name: Blindness
Description: Strike a target blind.

Name: Bottomless Stomach
Description: Store things in a creature's stomach.

Name: Circle of Protection
Description: A creature emits an aura that protects those within against an alignment.

Name: Claim Curse
Description: Draw a creature's curse into you temporarily.

Name: Clairaudience
Description: Hear through an invisible magical sensor.

Name: Cozy Cabin
Description: Conjure a temporary cabin sheltered from the elements.

Name: Cup of Dust
Description: You curse the target with a thirst no drink can quench.

Name: Curse of Lost Time
Description: Artificially erode or age a target.

Name: Day's Weight
Description: Use time magic to fatigue a creature.

Name: Distracting Chatter
Description: Distract a creature with auditory illusions.

Name: Dream Message
Description: Send a message that arrives in a dream.

Name: Enthrall
Description: Your speech makes creatures fascinated with you.

Name: Familiar's Face
Description: Implant your senses in your animal companion or familiar.

Name: Ghostly Weapon
Description: Make a weapon affect incorporeal creatures.

Name: Glyph of Warding
Description: Store a spell in a symbol to make a trap.

Name: Gravity Well
Description: Pull all creatures towards the center of a sphere of altered gravity.

Name: Haste
Description: Speed up a creature so it can attack or move more often.

Name: Heroism
Description: Stoke a creature's inner heroism to make it more competent.

Name: Hypercognition
Description: Recall massive amounts of information in an instant.

Name: Hypnotic Pattern
Description: Shifting colors dazzle and fascinate creatures.

Name: Impending Doom
Description: Make a foe witness its potential death and become distressed.

Name: Invisibility Sphere
Description: You and creatures near you become invisible as you explore.

Name: Levitate
Description: Float an object or creature a few feet of the ground.

Name: Locate
Description: Learn the direction to an object.

Name: Magical Fetters
Description: Ghostly manacles launch from your outstretched hand and clasp around the target's limbs, impeding its movements.

Name: Mind of Menace
Description: Set a contingency to punish a foe's mental effect and protect yourself from it.

Name: Mind Reading
Description: Read a creature's surface thoughts.

Name: Nondetection
Description: Protect a creature or object from detection.

Name: Oneiric Mire
Description: Create illusory quicksand that tricks creatures into thinking they're stuck.

Name: Ooze Form
Description: Turn into an ooze battle form.

Name: Organsight
Description: See a foe's organs, and use your knowledge to deal precision damage.

Name: Paralyze
Description: Freeze a creature in place.

Name: Perseis's Precautions
Description: Leaving nothing to chance, you weave divinatory precautions against an ambush, alerting the target to danger.

Name: Phantom Prison
Description: Trap a creature in illusory walls until it disbelieves.

Name: Pyrotechnics
Description: You turn a fire into either a burst of blinding fireworks or a thick cloud of choking smoke

Name: Roaring Applause
Description: Force the target to cheer and applaud you.

Name: Rouse Skeletons
Description: Rouse a squadron of skeletons to claw your foes.

Name: Sculpt Sound
Description: Quiet or alter the sound from a creature or object.

Name: Secret Page
Description: Alter the appearance of a page.

Name: Shadow Projectile
Description: React when an ally makes a ranged attack to create a shadow double of the attack, distracting and damaging the foe.

Name: Shift Blame
Description: Trick someone into thinking someone else is to blame for your attack or blunder.

Name: Slow
Description: Make a creature slower, reducing its actions.

Name: Sudden Recollection
Description: Plant information in a creature's subconscious to be revealed on a trigger you choose.

Name: Threefold Aspect
Description: Switch between versions of yourself at different ages.

Name: Time Jump
Description: Leap forward in time, moving swiftly.

Name: Vampiric Touch
Description: Deal negative damage and gain temporary HP with a touch.

Name: Wall of Shadow
Description: You form a wall of pure darkness in a straight line up to 60 feet long and 10 feet high.

Name: Wanderer's Guide
Description: Find an ideal route to a location.

Name: Web of Eyes
Description: Put scrying sensors on creatures, allowing them to share their vision with others.

Name: Whirling Scarves
Description: You surround yourself in a vortex of whirling colorful scarves of force that obfuscate you and disorient your foes.

Name: Zone of Truth
Description: Designate an area where creatures are compelled to be truthful.

Name: Aromatic Lure
Description: You override a target's olfactory senses, luring them to a specific location through tantalizing false scents.

Name: Bestial Curse
Description: Make a humanoid take on features of a beast.

Name: Blink
Description: Flit between the planes, vanishing and reappearing.

Name: Bloodspray Curse
Description: Curse a foe with deeper wounds and bleeding.

Name: Call the Blood
Description: With a word and gesture, you cause streams of blood to erupt from the target's mouth, nostrils, ears, or other facial openings and come rushing into your mouth.

Name: Chroma Leach
Description: Sap the color and vitality from a living creature.

Name: Chromatic Armor
Description: Glowing armor sheds light, dazzling foes and granting random resistances.

Name: Chromatic Ray
Description: Ray of light causes effects based on its color.

Name: Clairvoyance
Description: See through an invisible magical sensor.

Name: Clownish Curse
Description: You afflict the target with a curse that causes it to emit ridiculous noises as it moves.

Name: Compel True Name
Description: You instruct the target to do something, compelling obedience by calling it by its true name.

Name: Confusion
Description: Befuddle a creature, making it act randomly.

Name: Countless Eyes
Description: Cause magical eyes to appear all over a creature's body.

Name: Daydreamer's Curse
Description: You impose a curse upon the target that renders it easily distracted and unable to focus its thoughts on tasks that demand insight or discernment.

Name: Detect Scrying
Description: Find out if scrying effects are in the area.

Name: Dimension Door
Description: Teleport yourself up to 120 feet.

Name: Dimensional Anchor
Description: Keep a creature from teleporting or traveling to other planes.

Name: Discern Lies
Description: Expertly detect lies and falsehoods.

Name: Dull Ambition
Description: Curse a creature with an unfortunate lack of ambition.

Name: Enervation
Description: Drain a creature's vigor.

Name: Favorable Review
Description: You enchant a creature to ensure they have only good things to say about your show.

Name: Fey Form
Description: Turn into a fey battle form.

Name: Fly
Description: Cause the target creature to gain a fly Speed.

Name: Forgotten Lines
Description: Restore destroyed or censored text.

Name: Gaseous Form
Description: Turn a willing creature into a flying cloud.

Name: Ghostly Tragedy
Description: Have spirits reenact a violent event.

Name: Girzanje's March
Description: You sing a prayer for war, inspiring valor in allies who hear your song.

Name: Glibness
Description: Lie with impunity.

Name: Globe of Invulnerability
Description: Magical sphere counteracts spells that would enter it.

Name: Hallucinatory Terrain
Description: A natural environment appears to be another kind of terrain.

Name: Infectious Melody
Description: An infectious tune makes creatures sing along.

Name: Internal Insurrection
Description: You afflict the target with the supernatural disease known as internal insurrection, causing portions of their body to rebel against the whole, leading to painful agonies and, in time, death.

Name: Invisibility Curtain
Description: Wall makes creatures on one side invisible to the other side.

Name: Magic Mailbox
Description: Interdimensionally link two containers.

Name: Mirror's Misfortune
Description: Split into two copies. Destroying the fake curses the attacker.

Name: Modify Memory
Description: Change or implant memories.

Name: Necrotic Radiation
Description: You imbue the touched object or space with slow-acting necrotic radiation.

Name: Nightmare
Description: Plague a creature's dreams with disturbing nightmares.

Name: Ocular Overload
Description: Set a contingency to interfere with the vision of a creature attacking you.

Name: Outcast's Curse
Description: Curse a creature to be off-putting and grating.

Name: Painful Vibrations
Description: Damage, deafen, and sicken a foe with sonic vibrations.

Name: Pernicious Poltergeist
Description: Call forth a poltergeist to make mischief.

Name: Phantasmal Killer
Description: Place a fearsome image in a creature's mind to scare and possibly kill it.

Name: Private Sanctum
Description: Black fog prevents sensing, scrying, and mind-reading on anyone within.

Name: Ravenous Portal
Description: Door turns into a mimic when others try to open it.

Name: Read Omens
Description: Get a piece of advice about an upcoming event.

Name: Rebounding Barrier
Description: You swiftly raise a reflective barrier, reducing physical damage and rebounding it onto your attacker.

Name: Remove Curse
Description: Counteract a curse afflicting a creature.

Name: Replicate
Description: Create an illusory duplicate of a creature.

Name: Resilient Sphere
Description: Create a sphere of force that blocks anything that would come through.

Name: Rope Trick
Description: Animate a rope that rises to an extradimensional hiding place.

Name: Sanguine Mist
Description: Create a cloud of life-draining fog that siphons vitality into you.

Name: Savant's Curse
Description: You afflict the target with a curse that fills its mind with distracting and hyperspecialized minutiae, causing it to second-guess even simple facts.

Name: Seal Fate
Description: Curse a creature to be harmed by a certain type of damage.

Name: Spell Immunity
Description: Name a spell to negate its effects on you.

Name: Spiritual Anamnesis
Description: Overwhelm a target with memories of a past life.

Name: Spiritual Attunement
Description: Attune to an aligned plane to protect yourself and harm creatures opposed to that plane.

Name: Suggestion
Description: Suggest a course of action a creature must follow.

Name: Talking Corpse
Description: Have a corpse answer three questions.

Name: Telepathy
Description: Communicate telepathically with any creatures near you.

Name: Tortoise and the Hare
Description: Quicken an ally and slow a foe.

Name: Umbral Graft
Description: Attempt to steal an active spell.

Name: Vampiric Maiden
Description: A ghostly iron maiden harms a creature and transfers its vitality to you.

Name: Variable Gravity
Description: Adjust gravity's grip between high, low, and normal gravity.

Name: Veil
Description: Disguise many creatures as other creatures.

Name: Winning Streak
Description: Quicken a target and make its critical hits spread the quickness.

Name: Aberrant Form
Description: Transform into an aberration battle form.

Name: Abyssal Plague
Description: Inflict a draining curse.

Name: Bandit's Doom
Description: Set up a ward to protect an item.

Name: Banishment
Description: Send a creature back to its home plane.

Name: Black Tentacles
Description: Tentacles in an area grab creatures.

Name: Blink Charge
Description: Teleport and attack with magical force.

Name: Blister
Description: Grow large blisters on a creature and pop them to spray acid.

Name: Blood Feast
Description: Your head splits vertically into an enormous maw, which feasts upon the target's blood.

Name: Chromatic Wall
Description: A wall of light offers a unique protection based on its color.

Name: Cloak of Colors
Description: Bright colors dazzle creatures near the target, and attacks cause blinding flashes of light.

Name: Crushing Despair
Description: Make a creature sob uncontrollably.

Name: Death Ward
Description: Protect a creature against negative energy.

Name: Dreaming Potential
Description: The target retrains in its dreams.

Name: Ectoplasmic Expulsion
Description: You call upon tendrils of ephemeral ectoplasm to pass through the target and carry away a harmful psychic affliction.

Name: False Vision
Description: Trick a scrying spell.

Name: Forceful Hand
Description: Create a hand of force that can interpose to defend you or attack if heightened.

Name: Glimmer of Charm
Description: Briefly improve the attitude of nearby creatures with a charming aura.

Name: Hallucination
Description: A creature believes one thing is another, can’t detect something, or sees something that’s not really there.

Name: Illusory Scene
Description: Create an imaginary scene containing multiple creatures and objects.

Name: Inevitable Disaster
Description: Twist fate to damage a foe in the near future.

Name: Invoke Spirits
Description: Call a group of ghostly apparitions to attack your foes.

Name: Mariner's Curse
Description: Infect a creature with the curse of the rolling sea.

Name: Mind Probe
Description: Uncover knowledge and memories in a creature's mind.

Name: Mirecloak
Description: You wrap the targeted creatures in thin, sickly green shrouds that sap information from attackers.

Name: Mirror Malefactors
Description: Mirrors surround a target, and the reflections attack them repeatedly.

Name: Portrait of the Artist
Description: Appear to have the features and skills of a famous artist.

Name: Prying Eye
Description: An invisible eye transmits what it sees to you.

Name: Ravening Maw
Description: You evoke Zevgavizeb’s unceasing hunger and inflict it upon your target.

Name: Repelling Pulse
Description: Telekinetically knock creatures back and damage them with force.

Name: Return Beacon
Description: You create a unique planar beacon somewhere within the spell's range that remains in place.

Name: Rewinding Step
Description: Anchor your location in time so you can quickly return.

Name: Rip the Spirit
Description: Tear at a living creature's spirit with negative energy to damage and drain it.

Name: Secret Chest
Description: Hide a container on the Ethereal Plane.

Name: Sending
Description: Send a mental message to a creature anywhere on the planet and get a reply.

Name: Shadow Blast
Description: Shape a cone of shadow to deal damage of a type you choose.

Name: Shadow Siphon
Description: React to lessen the damage from an enemy's spell by making it partially illusion.

Name: Shadow Walk
Description: Travel rapidly via the Shadow Plane.

Name: Strange Geometry
Description: Confoundingly warp spatial geometry, making passage difficult and destinations unpredictable.

Name: Subconscious Suggestion
Description: Plant a mental suggestion that must be followed when a trigger occurs.

Name: Summon Entity
Description: Conjure an aberration to fight on your behalf.

Name: Synaptic Pulse
Description: Slow creatures with a mental blast.

Name: Synesthesia
Description: Rewire a creature's senses.

Name: Telekinetic Haul
Description: Move a large object.

Name: Telepathic Bond
Description: Link minds with willing creatures to communicate telepathically at great distances.

Name: Temporary Glyph
Description: Quickly scribe a short-lived glyph to blast foes.

Name: Tongues
Description: Let a creature understand and speak all languages.

Name: Wall of Flesh
Description: Spawn a wall of living flesh.

Name: Aura of the Unremarkable
Description: You and allies in the area appear to be completely innocuous to other creatures within the spell's area, regardless of the actions you're committing.

Name: Blanket of Stars
Description: A cloak of darkness hides you in the dark and dazzles those who get too close.

Name: Blinding Fury
Description: Curse a creature that attacks you, making its victims become invisible to it.

Name: Cast into Time
Description: Make a creature fall through time, damaging and sickening it.

Name: Catch Your Name
Description: You learn a private name (but not the true name) of the creature who spoke your name, as well as their precise location, unless they succeed at a Will save to negate the effect.

Name: Chromatic Image
Description: Colorful mirror images damage foes who destroy them.

Name: Collective Transposition
Description: Teleport up to two creatures to new positions near you.

Name: Dominate
Description: A creature must obey your orders.

Name: Feeblemind
Description: Stupefy a creature permanently.

Name: Mislead
Description: Turn invisible and create a duplicate of yourself who acts like you.

Name: Phantasmal Calamity
Description: Damage a creature mentally with visions of an apocalypse.

Name: Repulsion
Description: Prevent creatures from approaching you.

Name: Scintillating Safeguard
Description: Reactively protect multiple creatures from harm with a magic barrier.

Name: Scrying
Description: Spy on a creature.

Name: Spellwrack
Description: Curse a creature to be harmed when a spell is cast on it and lower the duration of its spells.

Name: Spirit Blast
Description: Damage a creature's spiritual essence.

Name: Teleport
Description: Transport you and willing creatures a great distance.

Name: Temporal Ward
Description: You ward a target doorway or container with a temporal trap that rewinds the personal timeline of creatures trying to open it.

Name: True Seeing
Description: See through illusions and transmutations.

Name: Unexpected Transposition
Description: React to switch places with a creature.

Name: Vampiric Exsanguination
Description: Draw blood and life force from creatures in a cone.

Name: Vibrant Pattern
Description: Make a pattern of lights that dazzles and blinds.

Name: Wall of Force
Description: Create an invisible and durable wall of magical force.

Name: Zealous Conviction
Description: Instill unshakable conviction and zeal in willing creatures.

Name: Zero Gravity
Description: Remove gravity in an area.

Name: Blightburn Blast
Description: Inflict a creature with blightburn sickness.

Name: Dimensional Lock
Description: Prevent teleportation and planar travel.

Name: Duplicate Foe
Description: Create a temporary duplicate of an enemy that fights for you.

Name: Energy Aegis
Description: A creature gains resistance to acid, cold, electricity, fire, force, and sonic.

Name: Ethereal Jaunt
Description: Use the Ethereal Plane to move through objects and into the air.

Name: Force Cage
Description: Form a prison of pure magical force.

Name: Inexhaustible Cynicism
Description: Make creatures paranoid and cynical.

Name: Leng Sting
Description: You use the power of nightmares to magically replicate the venomous attack of the aberrant and cunning Leng spiders.

Name: Magnificent Mansion
Description: Conjure a secure dwelling in a demiplane.

Name: Mask of Terror
Description: A creature’s fearsome illusory appearance frightens observers.

Name: Maze of Locked Doors
Description: The target of your spell is drawn into a long, twisting, extradimensional hallway.

Name: Plane Shift
Description: Transport creatures to another plane of existence.

Name: Possession
Description: Send your mind and soul into another creature’s body.

Name: Prismatic Armor
Description: Multicolored armor dazzles foes and protects against many damage types.

Name: Prismatic Spray
Description: Shoot rainbow beams that have various effects on creatures in a cone.

Name: Project Image
Description: Make an illusion of yourself you can cast spells through.

Name: Retrocognition
Description: Sense impressions of past events at your location.

Name: Return to Essence
Description: You unravel the magic of a spell that affects a container, door, or lock, converting it into energy you can repurpose to power your own spells.

Name: Reverse Gravity
Description: Flip the gravitational pull in an area.

Name: Shadow Raid
Description: A swarm of illusory shadows damages foes in the area and provides concealment.

Name: Tempest of Shades
Description: Summon an incarnate tornado of undead shades to drain and frighten foes.

Name: Time Beacon
Description: You create a beacon in time, intending to return to it if things go wrong.

Name: True Target
Description: You delve into the possible futures of the next few seconds to understand all the ways your foe might avoid harm.

Name: Visions of Danger
Description: Create a vision of horrid, swarming creatures that causes mental damage.

Name: Warp Mind
Description: Confuse a creature, possibly permanently.

Name: Antimagic Field
Description: Magic doesn't function in an area around you.

Name: Canticle of Everlasting Grief
Description: Mournful dirge frightens and mentally damages a foe, preventing its bonuses.

Name: Devour Life
Description: You attempt to utterly consume the target's life force.

Name: Disappearance
Description: Make a creature invisible, silent, and undetectable by any and all senses.

Name: Discern Location
Description: Discover a target's exact location within unlimited range.

Name: Dream Council
Description: Communicate through a shared dream.

Name: Maze
Description: Trap a creature in an extradimensional maze.

Name: Mind Blank
Description: Protect a creature from mental magic and some divinations.

Name: Prismatic Wall
Description: Form a protective wall with seven chromatic layers.

Name: Prying Survey
Description: You create eight invisible, floating eyes, each about 3 inches in diameter, that scan the area around you, transmitting rough impressions of the environment.

Name: Scintillating Pattern
Description: Cause an array of color that dazzles, confuses, and stuns.

Name: Spirit Song
Description: Sing an eldritch song that damages any creature that has a spirit.

Name: Spiritual Epidemic
Description: Weaken a target with a communicable curse.

Name: Uncontrollable Dance
Description: Overcome a target with an all-consuming urge to dance.

Name: Undermine Reality
Description: You lash a target with tendrils of shadow that steal some of its substance, making it quasi-real.

Name: Unrelenting Observation
Description: You and other creatures use scrying to track a subject exactly.

Name: Astral Labyrinth
Description: You connect the entire area with an invisible maze of astral energy that interferes with dimensional and mental magic.

Name: Bind Soul
Description: Imprison a dead creature's soul.

Name: Divinity Leech
Description: You disrupt the connection between a divine caster or deific servitor and their deity, blocking their use of divine power.

Name: Foresight
Description: Sense when a creature is in danger and react to protect it with good fortune.

Name: Overwhelming Presence
Description: Take on the majesty of a god.

Name: Prismatic Shield
Description: Shield-sized shards of multicolored light manifest in the air around you, each rotating quickly to intercept attacks.

Name: Prismatic Sphere
Description: Form a protective sphere composed of seven chromatic layers.

Name: Proliferating Eyes
Description: You implant a contagious, scrying eye that spreads to others by touch.

Name: Resplendent Mansion
Description: Conjure a mansion that lasts for a day.

Name: Telepathic Demand
Description: Send a mental message that impels a creature toward a course of action.

Name: Unfathomable Song
Description: Song debilitates creatures in weird ways.

Name: Unspeakable Shadow
Description: Transform a creature's shadow into a frightening monster and make them flee or fight it.

Name: Voracious Gestalt
Description: Create a spirit gestalt that eats souls and grows stronger.

Name: Wail of the Banshee
Description: Scream, dealing damage and draining creatures.

Name: Weird
Description: Frighten, deal mental damage, and possibly kill large numbers of creatures.

Name: Alter Reality
Description: Warp reality to duplicate occult spells.

Name: Fabricated Truth
Description: Make creatures believe something is fact.

Name: Fated Confrontation
Description: Isolate two fated opponents and let them twist each other's fate.

Name: Gate
Description: Tear open a portal to another plane.

Name: Indestructibility
Description: Become briefly immune to everything.

Name: Nullify
Description: React to automatically counteract a spell and take backlash damage.

Name: Remake
Description: Recreate a destroyed object.

Name: Shadow Army
Description: Duplicate yourself to have your shadows fight enemies as you hide amongst them.

Name: Time Stop
Description: Briefly stop time for everything but you.
